name: ShatterRace
description:
This game was created as part of the 2020 Gamerella Game Jam. 

Our entire team lost power a few hours before the end, so it's a little wonky in the third level, but it's still playable and the concepts are there.

The goal was to conceptually explore how to deal with a primarily white workforce in AAA through finding people like you and allies and working together.

You need a keyboard for this - the controls are left and right arrows to turn, forward arrow to accelerate, and back arrow to reverse.
